DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calculated aggregate value of the longest diameter of all target lesions measured in millimeters (mm).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the sum of longest lesion diameter.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several.:(LEE-zhun) An area of abnormal tissue change.

Concepts.definition: Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Property.preferredDefinition: Sum; the final aggregate amount.:Diameter; the length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle and connecting two points on the circumference.

Concepts.definition: The length of a straight line passing through the center of a circle or sphere and connecting two points on the circumference.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's tumor.
